creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
text: A large tapestry filled with multiple colors, shapes, and lines. The bottom lower left corner has a large L shaped field of red with smaller field of orange in the middle left side. The right side has a right vertical rectangle at the top, a large deep red vertical rectangle at the center, and a white square at the bottom. On the left top of the textile are two orange and blue squares, followed by a mustard yellow horizontal rectangle shape. Below the squares at the left top of the tapestry is a large field of white that the radiates downward. Thin blue and red horizontal and vertical lines fill the central area, which are further embellished by small blue squares. Flanking the white vertical area are two thicker mustard yellow bands.
title: Old Fashioned Window/2
